songs.title: Bliss
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Touch me, baby
It feels so amazing (Yeah)
And you stimulate me
And you make me want you more and more

[Verse 1]
What do I do, what do I say?
Does it feel good, to you this way?
I wanna be, all that you need
Boy, what's your fantasy?
Better hold on, ready or not
Baby, my love ain't gonna stop
Take it down low, make me get high

[Chorus]
Ooh, my love goes
On and on and on and on and on
My love goes
On and on and on and on and on
My, my, my, my loving goes
On and on and on and on and on
My love goes
On and on and on and on and on
See, all my love's for you

[Verse 2]
Baby, don't you rush me, no
You gotta take it slow
Just let the feeling grow
Until it overflows
Anyway you want it now
Just gotta tell me how
To give you everything
You've even dared to dream

[Verse 3]
Isn't it bliss, to you right now?
Don't be subdued, say it out loud
Ain't it a sweet, luscious delight? (Sweet)
When you're immersed in my
Ocean of love, coming on strong (Coming on)
Baby, I've been waiting so long (Strong)
Revel inside of paradise

[Chorus]
Ooh, my love goes
On and on and on and on and on (Yes)
My love goes
On and on and on and on and on
My, my, my, my loving goes
On and on and on and on and on
My love goes
On and on and on and on and on

[Verse 4]
So
Gimme some pure (Gimme some pure)
Delectable love (Delectable love)
Like I'm gonna give to you (I'm gonna give it to you)
Keep coming around (Keep coming around)
'Cause I won't run out ('Cause I won't run out)
I can't get enough of you, my love goes on

[Chorus]
Ooh, my love goes
On and on and on and on and on
My, my, my, my loving goes
On and on, on and on, on and on (My love goes)
My, my love goes on
My, my, my, my loving goes
On and on and on and on and on (On, on, on)

[Hook]
See all my love's for you
You baby, you baby, you baby, my (My love goes)
See all my love's for you (See all my love's for you)
You baby, you baby, you baby, my (Oh, it's for you)
My, my, my, my loving goes (You let it go)
You baby, you baby, you baby my (On, on, on, on)
See all my loves for you
You baby, you baby, you baby, my (For you)
My, my, my, my loving goes
My love goes on and on (You baby, you baby, baby my)
My
See all my loves for you (My love goes)
You baby, you baby, you baby, my (Amazing)
My, my, my, my loving goes

[Bridge]
Just drinking you in (You baby, you baby, you baby my)
And still tingling
Baby, can't you feel
What you do to me? (My love goes)
Ain't nobody who (You baby, you baby, you baby my)
Can compare to you
What you waiting for?
Come give me some more (My, my, my, my loving goes)

[Hook]
You baby, you baby, (Yeah) you baby, my
See all my loves for you (Oh)
You baby, you baby, you baby my (Come do it sometime)
You baby, you baby, you baby my

[Outro]
My love goes
My love goes
My love goes (My love goes)
My love goes
My love goes
My love goes (My love goes)
For you
Ah (My love goes)
Baby, it's all for you
